Text:
Isn't this download incredibly wasteful? There's loads of bmps inside which could be compressed pretty well with rar of 7z. 

The avis, and everything else except for the sample games, can be downloaded from https://sites.google.com/site/rpgstudio/

Compressing that download leaves only ~100MB instead of 2GB.

@omen88

True, problem is lots of people stupid enough just to know the RAR need to uncompressed first. And I don't want to make difficult for those kind of peoples.
